content: I live in Wallaceburg Ontario, I ordered something and I was suppost to of gotten it Yesterday, They told me it was delievered and normally I would see it outside my door with a text message and the picture of my package, but I didnt even get that, There is no phone number to make a complaint noticeable and now I am out of that money and the pictures are out there of my son and I believe a homeless has my package, I JUST WANT MY ORDER AMAZON
So far, so good.
Good for shopping if you're super busy but it deletes things from my cart, like i had a bunch of things in there and they're just gone??? I spent time finding these things and they just disappear.
wonderful app

I've already been boycotting this awful company for months, but sometimes you just have to get certain items through Amazon. Made my first purchase of '25 on July 17, and it's now July 25 and I'm still waiting for the item to ship and for the money to come out of my account. I don't know what's happened since I was a somewhat regular customer, but things have clearly gone downhill. Particularly given that when I bypass Amazon and buy directly from Sony or whomever they ship way faster.

Although I like shopping on Amazon, it's disappointing that the timeframe place for delivery is not supported. I expect as a prime member for more than a dozen years to get what's asked for with the stated delivery time to get my merchandise. I understand issues at times. However, when it happens frequently, it's a problem for me.

The competence of shippers & drivers really does depend on the city you live in. The previous city I resided, shippers & drivers were always on top of everything. That changed the moment I moved recently. Now a lot of them have the competence of FedEx, which is NOT a compliment, taking their sweet time getting anything shipped & delivered. My rating will go up IF & when I see shippers & drivers actually do the job they're paid to do.

I was so happy to find my package by my door. so pleased with Amazon.
Is it just me, or does everyone notice the changes to this Amazon app. The dollar amounts aren't in USD, the description are different, I may uninstall.
Terrific. love to see my merchandise when I receive it. fast delivery too
Great jeans and great fit. Have bought before and love them.

I'm not sure what I'm paying for since most of my packages arrive late at night and never on time, and most of the boxes also arrive damaged and poorly packed. My favorite is I just found that Amazon decided which credit card was going to be my default payment and auto set it without my permission. Amazon has gotten too big for its britches. Walmart did, too. It's just a matter of time before people find an alternative to your deceptive business practices and shabby delivery services.
have been having trouble with some orders and sadly when I was able to speak to someone in costumer service the told me they could not help

For the past few months when I scroll through reviews it will randomly put me back to the top of the review section. Then I have to scroll all the way back down to continue reading. Sometimes it gets so irritating I give up and just don't buy the item. It's happening on both of the phones I use so it's an app issue.

I have items in my cart, but can't get to them. i have to stop the app, then try again and sometimes it works This bug has been going on for a while. Maybe if you'd fix the app, you'd make more money to pay for Jeff's ridiculous wedding.

Whole family LOVE Amazon. We can buy anything we're looking for here, from erasers to personalised flags. Literally the most difficult thing to obtain is obtainable through Amazon. Great deals, offers and promos too. You will not be disappointed ;-)

I think it was cancelled without realizing that customer will miss the Prime Days discount.

I hate this. what happened to clicking on my orders and just seeing my orders. as a disabled senior with poor eyesight trying to just place an order is a nightmare. since I am home bound I have literally no choice. can't go to whole foods or any other store . spent hours trying to place an order and now I can't find whether it was placed or not. can't talk to robots and finding an actual person to help me takes hours. I am so upset about this.. before you made these crazy..BOO

up to this time, I loved this app and the company. recently I posted a review honey products that I purchased and gave it an honest review. I gave it a four star review. and I stated how it was a cheap and economical/very basic tool. Amazon says that I cannot post that that it goes against their community standards!!!?? Them pulling down an honest review that was favorable to the vendor is not within the community standards either!!! HYPOCRITES!
